document.full_text: the u.s. federal reserve on wednesday drained $750 million of temporary reserves from the banking system via a reverse repurchase agreement, according to the new york fed website.
document.title: fed drains $750 million of reserves via reverse repo
lines_and_colors: the u.s. federal reserve on wednesday drained $750 million of temporary reserves from the banking system via a reverse repurchase agreement, according to the new york fed website.
